TestCaseDocumentation.Title: JAXBContext.newInstance(Class...)
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: Tests that newInstance(Class..) throws JAXBException exception when class tree have colliding type names. An attempt to create new instance of jaxb context with a class PurchaseOrder, that reference a class Address. PurchaseOrder and Address have the same type name. (XMLType annotation). JAXBException should be thrown.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseSpec.InlineAssertion: newInstance(Class..) throws JAXBException when class tree have colliding type names.
TestCaseSpec.MemberSig: public static JAXBContext newInstance( Class... classesToBeBound ) throws JAXBException

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: JAXBContext.newInstance(Class...) - no parameters
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: Tests that newInstance(Class...) with empty parameter list creates a new instance of JAXBContext that "knows" about spec-defined classes. An element that contains a value of type String (xsd:string) is marshalled and then unmarshalled using "Unmarshal by Declared Type" method. No exception is thrown and resulting String is equal to initial.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseSpec.InlineAssertion: newInstance(Class...) with empty parameter list creates a new instance of JAXBContext that "knows" about spec-defined classes.
TestCaseSpec.MemberSig: public static JAXBContext newInstance( Class... classesToBeBound ) throws JAXBException
